data.message: There's a reason i dont like facebook nor this fb page

replies.message: Hi Jon. We’re sorry to hear that you didn’t enjoy your Facebook experience. If there is anything that you would change about it please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo. -Hailey

I have nvr been a fan, it helps to keep it contact with a few ppl n family. Other than that i only use it for the science and world wide propagandas.
But when i am forced to change my password once because of my account being hacked by a page i never clicked on nor was ever related too. Then later being forced to verify my identity just so i can change my password again in the same day. Its obnoxious and stupid. Being hacked is not the sites fault, but when i have to deal with a stupid system i am not satisfied
Facebook, why? So it can be ignored with the rest of complaints?

They don't respond to any complaints, I've had someone stalking me, making pages, taking my photos et (yes all were locked down) I've been reporting the pages coral most two years... They aren't removed. But funny thing is, I was 'BANNED' from reporting them to fast. Facebook make believe cares with standards they actually don't comply to
